title: Fifty Years of Service
creator_credit: Shan Benson and State Electricity Commission of Victoria
brief_description: The first fifty years of the State Electricity Commission is presented by means of archival film detailing highlights of the development of the power authority for Victoria - from 1919 to the completion of the giant Hazelwood power complex.
creator_credit_for_label: Shan Benson and State Electricity Commission of Victoria
